description: It was also the windiest February on the island since 1990, according to Ronaldsway Met Office.
title: Isle of Man records wettest February for 40 years
title_page: Isle of Man records wettest February for 40 years - BBC News
maintext: Despite the stormy conditions, the mean monthly temperature was almost a degree above average at 6.6°„C and there were 87 hours of sunshine, 11% more than usual.
